title: Facebook Deals Thread
description:
I thought it might be a good idea to get a thread going. Some of the deals popping up on FB are ridiculous so a centralized place to talk about them would be nice. Didn't want to title it "Daily Steals" since it looks like other companies have been posting stuff for cheap too (Big Dog Retail).

How are these Facebook sellers able to sell things for so cheap?

It looks like Facebook is subsidizing the price of various things in order to get people to start using their marketplace. These aren't "fell off of the truck" goods.

Why should I trust random Facebook sellers?

Facebook themselves will refund you if you don't receive your packages, or if they're not as described. Several people from CAG and Slickdeals who placed order with Daily Steals in particular are reporting that their purchases are new and not pre-owned.

What other discounts are there?

There looks to be another random $10 off offer that applies to your first order. However, not everyone is getting them. Possibly the coupon is Android only but no one can confirm from what I've seen so far.

All shipping is free. Doesn't look like there are any taxes either.

Daily Steals has a 30 day return policy on new/unused items.
Active Deals (not complete list):

Battlefield V (PS4) - $30
Fallout 76 (PS4) - $30 DEAD
Darksiders III (PS4) - $35
Xbox One Controller - $20 DEAD
DualShock 4 - $25 DEAD
Switch Pro Controller - $40 DEAD
Nintendo Switch - $179 DEAD
Hitman 2 (PS4) - $30
Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Breeze (Switch) - $30 DEAD
Super Mario Party (Switch) - $35 DEAD
Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Switch) - $40 DEAD
Pokemon Let's Go: Eevee! (Swtich) - $35 DEAD
Just Cause 4 (PS4) - $35 DEAD
Spider-Man (PS4) (Must select Latin American packaging) - $30 BACK TO $60
PS4 in-ear headset - $20

Red Dead Redemption 2 (XO) - $50

NOTE ABOUT DEAD DEALS: It seems that these randomly go in and out of stock. The Switch deal has been down several times but keeps coming back. Pay attention to them and you may get lucky!

This OP is extremely bare bones and is a work in progress. Please feel free to let me know what I should add!

title: Samsung Pay Gift Cards: 6% off PSN, 10% off GameStop, $15 for 3M XBL, 4% off ebay
description:
Samsung Pay (via app) has discounted gift cards. Usually limit 2 per 24 hours (hard 24 hours, not calendar day based). Note that GameStop gift card comes as a code via your email or via the app. There is a barcode in the email, so print that if you're going to the store.

Enjoy!

title: Monster Hunter Generations Ultimate $25 at Best Buy (YMMV extreme)
description:
Was at Best Buy and on the Nintendo stand that they have a bunch of 3DS games and and Switch games they had the sticker priced at $25 and it said save $34.99 (Iâ€™m guessing it was a glitch). Had to have them manually adjust the price so I didnâ€™t get the GCU on top (I asked a few times and they said not typically on Cyber Monday so I didnâ€™t fight it too much).

Again this is probably YMMV to the extreme, but if your out by Best Buy check all the locations that have the game on it and it might be a misprint on one of them.

title: 11/26/18 only - Target.com Cyber Monday: Extra 15% Off Sitewide (Excludes consoles, Switch games, RDR2, gift cards)
description:
Target.com Cyber Monday: Extra 15% Off Sitewide** (Exclusions Apply)
 
*Valid 11/26/18 Only*
 
Link
 
Some Example Categories:
  • Video Games (excluding console hardware, Switch games, RDR2)
  • Video Game Accessories(?) (Hopefully they don't count as "hardware")
  • Electronics (some exclusions apply - see terms below)
  • TVs (excluding Samsung, LG OLED)
  • Computers, Laptops, Tablets, and Phones (excluding Apple products)
  • Movies, Music, & Books
  • Toys
 
Shipping is free. Use REDcard for an additional 5% off. 15% off will automatically be applied at checkout on qualifying items.
 
Notable Exclusions: PS4 hardware, XBox One hardware, Nintendo hardware, Switch games, Red Dead Redemption II video games, prepaid cards, and gift cards.  See terms below for full list of exclusions.
 
 
**Offer available online only. Save 15% on Target.com. Discount applied at checkout. Not valid on previous orders. title: Meijer 11/24/18 Only.  Fallout 76 $25 plus tax + $10 off next purchase
description:
Haven't seen this posted yet, I just came back from the store, so the deal definitely works.  You'll need an MPerks account.  There is currently a $25 off Fallout 76 coupon on MPerks that will work for either PS4 or Xbox One.  Today is also Santa Bucks day, so get your cashier to scan the $10 off of any $49.99 or higher purchase before you put in your MPerks.  The Santa Bucks will drop the game to $49.99, and the MPerks coupon will drop the game further to $24.99 plus tax.  THEN, if that wasn't enough, you'll get a $10 reward printed with your receipt that is usable on your next purchase!

 

The game may or may not suck, but with Gamestop offering a firm $30 trade in value for PUR Members (until mid December), if you don't like it, you can always make a $15 profit on a flip!

title: 20% Amazon purchase using AMEX membership rewards points
description:
https://www.amazon.com/b?tag=cheapassgam08-20&node=18227844011

 

Ends tonight at 11:59pm PST unless Amazon ends it early.

 

Get 20% off eligible purchases when you use Membership Rewards points (maximum discount of $100). Follow the steps below to redeem your promotional discount:

1. Activate

Add this offer to your account by clicking the button below. Please note: you must click the button to redeem this offer.

2. Shop

Add one or more eligible items to your shopping cart. This item must be sold and shipped by Amazon.comto qualify.

3. Use points

Check out with your American Express Card and use Membership Rewards points for at least a portion of your order.

 

Terms & Conditions
  • This promotion starts at 12:00 am PST on November 22nd, 2018 and ends on the earlier of (i) at 11:59pm PST on 12/23/2018, or (ii) when Amazon elects to end the promotion.
  • Amazon reserves the right to modify or cancel this offer at any time.
  • Offer only applies to products sold by Amazon.com (Look for "sold by Amazon.com" or "sold by Amazon Digital Services LLC" on the product detail page). Products sold by third-party sellers or other Amazon entities will not qualify for this offer, even if "fulfilled by Amazon.com" or "Prime Eligible".
  • Offer does not apply to digital content.
  • Shipping charges and taxes may apply to the full value of discounted promotional items.
  • Offer may not be combined with other offers.
  • The maximum benefit you may receive from this offer is $100.
  • Offer applies only to the purchase of items made with a Membership Rewards eligible American Express Card, where Membership Rewards points are used for at least a portion of the purchase and the promotion code is activated. When you click on the 'Click to activate' button your Membership Rewards points will be temporarily set as default payment method at checkout for a duration of six hours, unless you manually update your payment option. The promotion remains valid even after the temporary default setting lapses, until the end of the promotion period.
  • Offer is non-transferable and may not be resold.
  • Offer discount will be allocated proportionally among all promotional items in your order.
  • If any of the products or content related to this offer are returned, your refund will equal the amount you paid for the product or content, subject to applicable refund policies.
  • Promotional discount may not be redeemed for Amazon.com Gift Cards.
  • If you violate any of these terms, the offer will be invalid.
